document_data.name: Agaricus
document_data.mainbody: '''Agaricus''' was one of the [[myconid]] rulers in [[Sporedome]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Quest for Sporedome|12-13}}
document_data.Personality: Agaricus was a noble and venerable creature. He did not much like the [[drow]] of [[Szith Morcane]] but could tolerate them.
